page.title: 03Winchhill Farm
page.content: On Wednesday July 3rd a group of children from my school went to talk to Mr. Sharp and he showed us around the farm.I saw two newly born calves.We saw where they sleep,eat and live in the Spring,Autunm and Winter.We saw the metel containers where the milk was stored.Mr.Sharp has 20 fields.He divides his fields with electric fencing.He puts his cows in a different field every day.Mr. Sharps cows are a pedigree herd of British Friesans.Sometimes the cows drink 10 gallons of water every day.At Mr.Sharps farm we saw the cows in the fields.As we stood and talked in the field the cows surrounded us.One cow licked my clip board. Julia Jackson Catherine Bot David Culley
